name: ResOsTrainTheTrainer
description: The material used to train instructors on the ResOS cloud training material

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:MartinPaulo/ResOsTrainTheTrainer gh-pages --force
